# PHP/CheckIPv6

* Module source code: [CheckIPv6.cmake](https://github.com/petk/php-build-system/blob/master/cmake/cmake/modules/PHP/CheckIPv6.cmake)

Check for IPv6 support.

Cache variables:

* `HAVE_IPV6`
  Whether IPv6 support is enabled.

## Basic usage

```cmake
# CMakeLists.txt
include(PHP/CheckIPv6)
```
